attributes.action: Hold a referendum to abolish the position of Mayor of London.
attributes.additional_details: The Mayor does not represent London.
attributes.background: Government to hold a referendum on the future of the Greater London Authority and call for the Mayor of London's position abolished.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government

rejection.details:
It's not clear if you want a referendum on removing the role of the Mayor of London, or the future of the Greater London Authority, or both.

You could start a petition for any of these things, but would need to make it clear what you wanted any referendum to be about.
